chathura :mama baluwa oyage linka.aththatama mataadambarayak awa ape kollek wena rataka gihin naniyama wada karanawa neda kiyala.methana thiyenne sanniwedana durwala kamak.rajya wishwawidyala wala igena ganna aya kagahanne oyalata igena ganna denna epa kiyala neweyi.hamotama upadhiyak dakwa igenaganna hadala denna kiyala.adhyapana kramaya wenas karala.aluth loketa hariyana upadhi patamala athikarala hamotao oya windawage duk nowida.amma thaththata duk nowi.karadarayak nowi.upadhiyak hamotama ganna pahasukam hadanna.
